Tab1Text1:
Rule #1 - No hacking, meshing, or exploiting bugs. No mesh structures.

Rule #2 - Keep structure spam to a minimum, no excessive griefing

Rule #3 - No slurs or offensive content of any kind in tribe names, player names, tame names, or anywhere else

Rule #4 - Dont take an excessive amount of base spots, keep it down to 1 cave per group

Rule #5 - Dont destroy/transfer loot if you are being raided

Rule #6 - Dont build turrets at spawn areas or on obelisks

Rule #7 - Dont use more than 3 soakers at a time (to prevent excessive lag)

Rule #8 - Never inside your tribe/group

Rule #9 No extreme toxicity, racism, or offensive discussions of any kind

Rule #10 Inactive FOBs cant be left up for more than 12 hours.
